20439.「おお <pc>か。\n じつはな……。王子は今\n 自分の部屋に 閉じこもって:
Oh, it's you, <pc>.
You see...the prince is currently
locked up in his room right now.

20440.「オーディスが ラーディス王の石版を\n 持ちかえったのは そなたも覚えているだ:
You remember how Odis brought back the
Tablet of King Ladis before, right?

20441.「そこに書かれていた 男王の育みの歌。\n 導きの歌というらしいが それを\n:
It was written there, the Song of Nurture of
the male king. It's called the Song of Guidance
and Odis deciphered it and sang it.

20442.「だが 結果は失敗だった……。\n 恵みの歌のような効果は 生みだせなかった。:
But the result was a failure... it did not
produce the same effect as the Song of Grace.

20443.「それで 相当 落ち込んでいてな。\n <pc>の 小粋なトークで\n オーディ:
He's been feeling pretty down about it. <Would
you please cheer up Odis with some of your
stylish talk?

20445.「シエラ巡礼地から見つけた 王の石版の文字は\n すべて解読することが できたん:
We managed to decipher all the characters
on the King's Tablet that we found from the
Sierra Shrinelands.

20446.「そこには 導きの歌の歌詞が書かれていた。\n すぐに 唄ってみたんだが 僕には:
On it were the words to a song of guidance. I
sang them right away, but they didn't produce
the nurturing effect they should have on me...

20447.「なぜだ…… なぜ ダメなんだ！\n 僕には 王になる資格がないと言うのか！！:
Why... why can't I be king? You're saying I'm
not qualified to be king!

20449.「やったのであります！\n 王の石版から 隠された文字を\n 見つけたのでありま:
You have done it! I have found the hidden
letters on the King's Tablet, my Prince~!

20451.「石版の側面に 注目であります。\n なんと そこにも うっすらと\n 文字が:
The side of the Tablet is the focus of
attention. There, too, there were faint
letters carved on the side!

20452.「そうか！ でかしたぞ エリーゴ調査員！！: Yeah, right! Way to go, Detective Eriego!

20453.「……よし。読み上げるから\n <pc>君も 聞いていてくれ。:
...Okay. I'm going to read it to you, and you
can listen to <pc> too.

20454.<center>言葉をつむぐだけでは\n『歌』は『歌』に なり得ない。:
A "song" cannot become a "song" by merely
stringing words together.

20455.<center>流れに言葉を乗せてこそ 『歌』となり得る。\nならば 私は その:
It can only be a "song" when the words are carried on the stream. If so, then I will offer my mastery to the Waterfall Queen's
feet.

20457.「瀑布というのは……滝のことだ。\n 女王と呼べるほど 大きな滝は\n 清廉の大:
By waterfalls I mean waterfalls. There is no
other waterfall big enough to be called the
Queen except the Great Purity Falls...

20458.「よし！ 清廉の大滝へ 行ってみよう。\n 今回は 僕ひとりで やってみる。\n:
All right! Let's go to the Great Purity
Falls. This time, I'll do it alone. No help
from <pc> this time!

20459.「あああっ。お待ちください 王子どの～！: Ahh. Please wait, Your Royal Highness~!

20460.「行ってしまわれた……であります。: I am sorry to say that he has gone....

20461.「小生も 王子どのと同じく\n 瀑布の女王とは 清廉の大滝を指すのであろうと\n:
I, like the prince, thought that Waterfall
Queen meant the Great Purity Falls, but...

20462.「どうも 引っかかるのでありますよ。\n くわしい話を 聞いていただきたいので\:
I'm a little stuck on this one. We would like
you to come to our research office for a more
detailed discussion.

20463.「<pc>。なにやら オーディスが\n ひとりで 出かけていったようだが。\n:
<pc>. Something about Odis going off
on his own. Do you know where he went?

20464.「ふむ……。王の石版には 隠された文字が\n あったというのか。瀑布の女王……。:
Hmmm... the King's Tablet has a hidden
message. Waterfall Queen... you went to the
Great Purity Falls.

20465.「清廉の大滝は 人が近づける場所ではない。\n ラーディス王と言えど 何かを\n:
The Great Purity Falls is not a place for a person to approach. I don't think even King Ladis would be able to hide something
from you.

20466.「調査団が 調査を続けているのだろう？\n ならば今回は そちらとタッグを組んで:
I assume that the investigative team is continuing their investigation? Then tag-team with them this time and follow up with the
prince .

20467.「それにしても 瀑布の女王とは\n かっこいい異名も あったものだ。\n ワシも:
But still, Waterfall Queen is such a cool
nickname. I wish I had such a nickname.

20468.「おお <pc>か。\n 調査団と 話はしてくれたようだな。:
Oh <pc>. I see you've spoken to the
survey team.

20469.「<pc>殿には 面倒をかけるが\n 調査団の依頼を 果たしてやってほしいのだ。:
I know this is a lot of trouble for
<pc>, but I need you to fulfill the
request of the survey team.

20470.「オーディスが 帰ってくるまでに\n 瀑布の女王の手がかりが 見つかれば\n い:
If only we could find some clue to the
Waterfall Queen by the time Odis gets back.

20471.「心配いらん。<pc>ならば\n きっと バッチリと やってくれるだろう。\n:
Don't worry. I'm sure <pc> will do a
great job. I know what I'm talking about!

20472.「……なるほど。瀑布の女王とは\n ヴァース大山林の滝を 指すのでありますか。\:
I see. Waterfall Queen refers to the
waterfalls of the Verse Mountain Forest? So
that means the prince is wasting his time...

20473.「……エリーゴ調査員！\n 清廉の大滝からは 何も見つからなかったぞ。:
...Detective Eriego! We didn't find anything
from the Great Purity Falls.

20474.「失礼ながら 王子どの。\n 小生は 瀑布の女王という言葉が 清廉の大滝を\n:
With all due respect, Your Highness. I did not
mean to imply that the Waterfall Queen refers
to the Great Purity Falls.

20475.「お引き止めしようとしたときには\n すでに 王子どのは 外へ……。:
By the time I tried to stop him, the prince
was already outside...

20476.「……そうか。僕の勇み足だったというわけか。: I see. So it was my own lack of courage.

20477.「いえいえ ご安心ください！！\n 我々調査団と <pc>どのの活躍により\n:
No, no, no, don't worry! Thanks to the efforts
of our survey team and <pc>, we have
found the location of the Waterfall Queen!

20478.「なに？ すぐに聞かせてくれ！！: What? I need to hear it now!

20479.「ふたつ滝の巡礼という ラーディス王の時代の\n 巡礼の手引書を 調べたのであり:
I studied a pilgrimage manual from the time of
King Ladis called "The Pilgrimage of the Two
Falls.

20480.「その結果 当時の清廉の大滝は 瀑布の王。\n ヴァース大山林の東にある滝が 瀑:
As a result, the Great Purity Falls at that time was called the King of Waterfalls. It turns out that the waterfall to the east of
the Verse Mountain Forest was called the Waterfall Queen!

20481.「なんと……。石版にある 瀑布の女王とは\n 清廉の大滝ではなく 別の滝のことを:
Oh my... the Waterfall Queen on the Tablet was
not referring to the Great Purity Falls,
but to another waterfall!

20482.「……なるほどな。当時は男王が国を治めていた。\n だから もっとも大きい清廉の:
...I see. In those days, a male king ruled the country. That's why the largest waterfall, the Great Purity Falls, was called the King of
the Falls, not the Waterfall Queen.

20483.「その後 女王が国を治める時代となり\n 清廉の大滝の異名が 変わったんだ……。:
Then came the time when the queen ruled the land, and the name of the Great Purity Falls was changed... and why didn't I know
about it?

20484.「……いや。手遅れになったわけじゃない。\n すぐに 瀑布の女王の足もとへ 行か:
...Nope. It's not too late. We must go at once
to the feet of the Waterfall Queen!

20485.「ふむ……。他の滝よりも 大きいな。\n この滝が どうやら 瀑布の女王のようだ:
Hmm... it's bigger than the other waterfalls.
This waterfall is apparently the Waterfall
Queen.

20486.「……王の石版に書かれていた\n 瀑布の女王の足もととは 滝つぼのことを\n 指:
...I think the reference to the Waterfall
Queen's feet on the King's Tablet refers to
the waterfall basin.

20487.「清廉の大滝の滝つぼは 入れるような\n 場所じゃなかったが ここなら入れる……:
The waterfall basin of the Great Purity
Falls was not a place you could enter, but
here you can...!

20488.「これは 男の王となるために\n 僕自身が やらなければいけないことだ。\n <:
This is what I have to do to become the king
of men. <pc> can wait here.

20489.「くっ……。思ったより 水が……。\n はげし……うおっ？:
Damn... more water than I thought... bald...
oh?

20490.「あったぞ……王の石版だ！: There it is... the King's Tablet!

20491.「僕の考えは 正しかったようだ。\n さっそく この石版を読んでみよう。:
It seems I was right. Let's read this Tablet
right away.

20492.<center>私の名は ラーディス。\n私が生きた この時代は\n闇の時代と言:
My name is Ladis. This age in which I live can
be called the age of darkness.

20493.<center>暴君と呼ばれし魔物が 破壊の限りを尽くし\n我がウェディの民は\:
The monster known as the Tyrant was about to
wreak havoc and bring ruin upon my people in
Weddie.

20494.<center>王である私は あらゆる手段を講じて\n民を絶望から 救わなければ:
As king, I had to do everything in my power to
save my people from despair.

20495.「……暴君とは 永遠の地下迷宮で\n <pc>君が 倒してくれた\n バサグラン:
...I assume the Tyrant mentioned here is
Tyrant Bogan, whom <pc> defeated
in the Labyrinth of Eternity.

20496.「あの時は 母上たちの歌による協力があった。\n 完全な状態のバサグランデが\n:
At that time, we had the help of our mothers
in singing. One can only imagine how much of a
threat a fully intact Bogan would have been.

20497.「むっ？ やはり 側面に文字があったか。\n 同じ手には 引っかからないぞ。:
Hmm? I knew there was writing on the side. I
won't fall for the same trick.

20498.<center>私の誓いを破り 男の王を目指す者よ。\nよくぞ ここまで たどり:
You who break my oath and aspire to be king of
men. I am proud of you for having made it this
far.

20499.<center>そなたの思いに 私も応えよう。\n今こそ 導きの歌の極意を 伝え:
I will respond to your thoughts. Now is the
time to share the secret of the song of
guidance.

20500.「やったぞ……。ついに 終わりが見えてきた。\n 導きの歌の極意を得る方法が 書:
We did it... the end is finally in sight. It
says here how to get the secret of the Guiding
Song!

20501.「だが まだ油断はしないほうがいいな。\n 城に帰り じっくりと調べてからにしよ:
But we better not let our guard down just yet.
Let's go back to the castle and check it out
first.

20502.「<pc>君。ご苦労だった。\n ここまでの報酬を 受け取ってほしい。:
<pc>. Thank you for your efforts. I
hope you've been rewarded for your efforts
thus far.

20503.「調査の内容によっては\n また 君のチカラが必要になるだろう。\n そのときは:
Depending on the nature of the investigation,
we may need your help again. I look forward to
working with you then!

31520.「<pc>君。今度は同行を頼みたい。\n ヴァース大山林へ向かって 瀑布の女王と:
. Now I'd like to ask you to accompany me. Let's head for the Verse Mountain Forest and find the waterfall known
as the Waterfall Queen!
